pages.text: e'ikhana se'i kitaba; yaâ€™ta kono sandeha na'i, muttakbisakalara babe hidayata
Yisakale gayebara prati imana posana karae, chalata kayema karae arau ami te'omlokaka yi pradana karaichom tara paraa byaya karae
Arau yisakale imana posana karae tara oparata, yi tomara prati aratirna karaa haiche arau yi tomara purbe aratirna karaa haichila arau te'omloka akhiraatara prati purna bisbasi
Te'omloke'i nija pratipalakara nirdesita hidayatara oparata ache arau te'omloke'i saphalyamandita
